titleStmt.title: DECASTICON IN ANGLICAM versionem scripti Laurentiani.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: DECASTICON IN ANGLICAM versionem scripti Laurentiani.

monogr.title: A discourse of the preseruation of the sight: of melancholike diseases; of rheumes, and of old age. Composed by M. Andreas Laurentius, ordinarie phisition to the King, and publike professor of phisicke in the Vniuersitie of Mompelier. Translated out of French into English, according to the last edition, by Richard Surphlet, practitioner in phisicke
monogr.author: Du Laurens, André

div.head: DECASTICON IN ANGLICAM versionem scripti Laurentiani.
div.l: QVae de Oculis nuper Medicorum scripsit Ocellus
De Senio, & Succis, Senibus, cunctaeque molestis
Gallia ne inuideas, nec enim tibi nascitur vni
Laurus tam florens; nostri hanc coluêre Britanni.
Tit turpes oculi maculas Surphlette suetus
Artisici remouere manu; (non vltima laus haec)
Nunc grato hoc multo melius noscêre labore.
